mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_PROJECT (PROJECT_NM, INSTT_CODE, BGNDE, ENDDE, PM, TRANSPORT_CT, REG_DATETIME, UPD_DATETIME, REG_ID, UPD_ID, NOTE, TEMP_COLUM) VALUES (#{PROJECT_NM}, #{INSTT_CODE}, #{BGNDE}, #{ENDDE}, #{PM}, #{TRANSPORT_CT}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d'), NULL, #{REG_ID}, NULL, "", "")
mapper.select: SELECT A.PROJECT_NO , A.PROJECT_NM , A.INSTT_CODE , A.BGNDE , A.ENDDE , A.PM , B.NAME AS PM_NAME , A.TRANSPORT_CT , A.REG_DATETIME , A.UPD_DATETIME , A.REG_ID , A.UPD_ID , C.CODE_NAME AS INSTT_NAME FROM TB_PROJECT AS A LEFT JOIN TB_MEMBER AS B ON TB_MEMBER.MEMBER_NO = A.PM LEFT JOIN TB_CODE AS C ON TB_CODE.CODE_ID = A.INSTT_CODE WHERE PROJECT_NO = #{project_no}
SELECT PROJECT_NO , PROJECT_NM , INSTT_CODE , BGNDE , ENDDE , PM , TRANSPORT_CT , REG_DATETIME , UPD_DATETIME , REG_ID , UPD_ID , NOTE , TEMP_COLUM FROM TB_PROJECT ORDER BY PROJECT_NO

SELECT A.PROJECT_NO , A.PROJECT_NM , A.INSTT_CODE , A.BGNDE , A.ENDDE , A.PM , A.TRANSPORT_CT , A.REG_DATETIME , A.UPD_DATETIME , A.REG_ID , A.UPD_ID , A.NOTE , A.TEMP_COLUM , B.CODE_NAME AS INSTT_NAME , C.NAME AS PM_NAME FROM TB_PROJECT AS A LEFT JOIN TB_CODE AS B ON A.INSTT_CODE = B.CODE_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MEMBER AS C ON A.PM = C.MEMBER_NO ORDER BY PROJECT_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_PROJECT_MEMBER (MEMBER_NO, PROJECT_NO, INPT_BGNDE, INPT_ENDDE, ROLE_CODE, CHRG_JOB, USE_LANG, REG_DATETIME, UPD_DATETIME, REG_ID, UPD_ID, NOTE, TEMP_COLUM) VALUES (#{MEMBER_NO}, #{PROJECT_NO}, #{INPT_BGNDE}, #{INPT_ENDDE}, #{ROLE_CODE}, #{CHRG_JOB}, #{USE_LANG}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d'), NULL, #{REG_ID}, NULL, "", "")
